sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import HeaderPage from "./header"; import FooterPage from "./footer"; import SidebarPage from "./sidebar"; import firebase from '../config'; //import {getDesignations} from './SelectDropdown'; class ViewLocation extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.datatable = null; this.state = { location_Name: '', addressl:'', address2:'', land_Mark: '', city: '', pincode: '', contact_Person_Name: '', contact_Number: '', email:'', permission_type: '', specifEmpName: '', rental_Deposit_Amount:'', rent_Per_Month:'', electricity_Per_Month:'', wifi_Per_Month:'', additional_Expenses:'', selectedOption:'', notes:'', EmployeesList:[], uploadImage:'', google_Map:'', isUploading: false, latitude: '', longitude: '', error_message: '', created_on: new Date().toLocaleString(), validError: true, avatar: "", progress: 0, avatarURL: "", filenames: [], downloadURLs: "", uploadProgress: 0, validError: true, Internet_CCTV_Camera:'', FSSAI_Registration:'', Deposit_For_Space:'', Electricity:'', WiFi_Connection:'', Rent_Amount_For_Space:'', House_Keeping:'', minimumPotentials:'', maximumPotentials:'', averagePotential:'', employer_sevice_message:'', FranchiseeList:[], franchiseeFee:'', roi:'', franchiseeRevinueShare:'', expenditures:'', }; } componentDidMount() { const {locationId} = this.props.match.params; console.log(locationId); var sessionId = sessionStorage.getItem("RoleId"); var userName = sessionStorage.getItem("user_name"); var ref = firebase .database() .ref(`Locations/${locationId}`); ref.on('value', snapshot => { var categories = snapshot.val(); console.log(categories); this.setState({ location_Name: categories.location_Name, addressl: categories.addressl, address2: categories.address2, land_Mark: categories.land_Mark, city: categories.city, pincode: categories.pincode, contact_Person_Name: categories.contact_Person_Name, contact_Number: categories.contact_Number, email: categories.email, rental_Deposit_Amount: categories.rental_Deposit_Amount, rent_Per_Month: categories.rent_Per_Month, electricity_Per_Month: categories.electricity_Per_Month, wifi_Per_Month: categories.wifi_Per_Month, additional_Expenses: categories.additional_Expenses, notes: categories.notes, userName:userName, downloadURLs: categories.uploadImage, created_on: categories.created_on, sessionId: sessionId, permission_type: categories.permission_type, selectedOption: categories.specifEmpName, locality: categories.locality, landMark: categories.land_mark, fullAddress: categories.full_address, latitude: categories.latitude, longitude: categories.longitude, Internet_CCTV_Camera: categories.Internet_CCTV_Camera, FSSAI_Registration: categories.FSSAI_Registration, Deposit_For_Space: categories.Deposit_For_Space, Electricity: categories.Electricity, WiFi_Connection:categories.WiFi_Connection, Rent_Amount_For_Space: categories.Rent_Amount_For_Space, House_Keeping:categories.House_Keeping, minimumPotentials:categories.Minimum_Potential, maximumPotentials:categories.Maximum_Potential, averagePotential :(Number(categories.Maximum_Potential)+Number(categories.Minimum_Potential))/2, expenditures:Number(categories.Electricity)+Number(categories.WiFi_Connection)+Number(categories.Rent_Amount_For_Space)+Number(categories.House_Keeping), loading: false, }); }); this.FranchiseeListView(); } FranchiseeListView() { var ref = firebase .database() .ref("Franchisee/"); ref.on('value', snapshot => { const data = []; console.log(snapshot.val()) snapshot.forEach(childSnapShot => { const Categories = { franchiseeId: childSnapShot .key .toString(), name: childSnapShot .val() .name, value: childSnapShot .val() .value, created_on: childSnapShot .val() .created_on }; data.unshift(Categories); }); this.setState({FranchiseeList: data,franchiseeFee:data[1].value,franchiseeRevinueShare:data[2].value,roi:Number(data[1].value)+ Number(this.state.Internet_CCTV_Camera)+Number(this.state.FSSAI_Registration) }); console.log(this.state.FranchiseeList[2].value); console.log(Number(data[1].value)+ Number(this.state.Internet_CCTV_Camera)+Number(this.state.FSSAI_Registration)); // this.$el = $(this.el); }); } render() { return (

plates sold in a month {this.state.minimumPotentials*30}

plates sold in 227 days {Math.round(((this.state.roi)/(this.state.minimumPotentials*this.state.franchiseeRevinueShare))*this.state.minimumPotentials)}
Franchise Revenue Share for 227 days (in Rs.) {this.state.roi}

plates sold per day {this.state.maximumPotentials}
plates sold in a month {this.state.maximumPotentials*30}
Return of Investment(in Days) {Math.round((this.state.roi)/(this.state.maximumPotentials*this.state.franchiseeRevinueShare))}
plates sold in 113 days {Math.round(((this.state.roi)/(this.state.maximumPotentials*this.state.franchiseeRevinueShare))*this.state.maximumPotentials)}
Franchise Revenue Share for 113 days (in Rs.) {this.state.roi}

plates sold per day {this.state.averagePotential}
plates sold in a month {this.state.averagePotential*30}
Return of Investment(in Days) {Math.round((this.state.roi)/(this.state.averagePotential*this.state.franchiseeRevinueShare))}
plates sold in 151 days {Math.round(((this.state.roi)/(this.state.averagePotential*this.state.franchiseeRevinueShare))*this.state.averagePotential)}
Franchise Revenue Share for 151 days (in Rs.) {this.state.roi}

); } } export default ViewLocation;
